chart.title: Top login users sorted by the number of login attempts

search.query: index="main" source="tcp:10514" notification=event category=AUTH | top user limit=15 | rename user as "Login User"

table.title: Top login users sorted by the hosts logged in from

search.query: index=main source="tcp:10514" notification=event category=AUTH | stats distinct_count(host) as "Number of the hosts" by user | sort - "Number of the hosts" | rename user as "Login User"

chart.title: The hosts (IP addresses) logged in as "$user_login_detail$"

search.query: index=main source="tcp:10514" notification=event category=AUTH user="$user_login_detail$" | stats count as "Number of login attempts" by host | sort - "Number of login attempts"

chart.title: Failed Login attempts sorted by the number of the hosts

search.query: index=main source="tcp:10514" notification=event category=AUTH | regex _raw="(Wrong password)|(User[a-zA-Z\s]+failed)" | stats distinct_count(host) as "Number of the hosts" by user | sort - "Number of the hosts" | rename user as "Login Users"

chart.title: The hosts (IP addresses) that the user "$failed_login_detail$" attempted to login

search.query: index=main source="tcp:10514" notification=event category=AUTH user="$failed_login_detail$" | regex _raw="(Wrong password)|(User[a-zA-Z\s]+failed)" | stats count as "Number of login attempts" by host | sort - "Number of login attempts"
index="main" source="tcp:10514" notification=audit name="Registry.Scan.Report" |stats count by cvedb_version | sort -cvedb_version

index=main source="tcp:10514" notification=audit name="Registry.Scan.Report" $cvedb_version$ | strcat registry repository _image_repo | strcat registry repository ":" tag image_name | eval total_vul_cnt = high_vul_cnt + medium_vul_cnt | dedup image_name | chart values(high_vul_cnt) as High, values(medium_vul_cnt) as Medium by image_name | sort - Total, high_vul_cnt, medium_vul_cnt

chart.title: The scan history of the image "$image_repo$" with different tags

search.query: index=main source="tcp:10514" notification=audit name="Registry.Scan.Report" $cvedb_version$ | strcat registry repository image_name |search image_name=$image_repo$ | dedup tag | eval total_vul_cnt = high_vul_cnt + medium_vul_cnt | timechart values(high_vul_cnt) as High, values(medium_vul_cnt) as Medium by tag
index=main source="tcp:10514" notification=audit (name="Admission.Control.Denied" OR name="Admission.Control.Violation") | timechart count by workload_image
index=main source="tcp:10514" (notification=threat OR notification=incident OR notification=violation) (level=Warning OR level=Critical) | timechart count by level

panel.title: List of alerted / blocked network violations

table.title: Pod Services (as a client) connect to the external server IP address(es)

search.query: index=main source="tcp:10514" notification=violation (policy_action=violate OR policy_action=deny) server_name=external | eval date = strftime(_time,"%m/%d/%y") | stats values(server_ip) as "Server IP addresses" by client_service, date | sort - date | rename client_service as "Pod Services (as a client)"

table.title: Pod Services (as a server) get connected by the external client IP address(es)

search.query: index=main source="tcp:10514" notification=violation (policy_action=violate OR policy_action=deny) client_name=external | eval date = strftime(_time,"%m/%d/%y") | stats values(client_ip) as "Client IP addresses" by server_service, date | sort - date | rename server_service as "Pod Services (as a server)"

chart.title: Pod services (as a client) generating network violations when connect to the external servers

search.query: index=main source="tcp:10514" notification=violation (policy_action=violate OR policy_action=deny) server_name=external | stats count as "network violations" by client_service | sort - "network violations" | rename client_service as "Pod Services"

table.title: External Server IP addresses connected from the $network_violation_client_service$

search.query: index=main source="tcp:10514" notification=violation (policy_action=violate OR policy_action=deny) server_name=external client_service="$network_violation_client_service$" | eval date = strftime(_time,"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S") | stats values(server_ip) as "Server IP addresses" by date | sort - date

chart.title: Pod Services (as a server) generating network violations when get connected from the external clients

search.query: index=main source="tcp:10514" notification=violation (policy_action=violate OR policy_action=deny) client_name=external | stats count as "network violations" by server_service | sort - "network violations" | rename server_service as "Pod Services"

table.title: External Client IP addresses connected to the $network_violation_server_service$

search.query: index=main source="tcp:10514" notification=violation (policy_action=violate OR policy_action=deny) client_name=external server_service="$network_violation_server_service$" | eval date = strftime(_time,"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S") | stats values(client_ip) as "Client IP addresses" by date | sort - date
